text: Skazhi: "Ne vlasten ya sebe ni dobroye (naznachit'), Ni (otvratit') durnoye ot sebya, Yesli Allakh togo ne pozhelayet. I yesli b sokrovennoye ya znal, YA by umnozhil vsyakoye dobro sebe (na pol'zu) I otvratil by zloye ot sebya. Vsego lish' uveshchatel' ya i blagovestnik Dlya tekh, kto veruyet (v Allakha)
